rulesDescription:
The rules of the game ar fairly easy, you have 6 guesses to guess the correct word before your opponent.

Each guess must be a valid word.

After submiting a word, each letter will get a color:
rulesWrongPosition: Orange: the letter is correct but in the wrong position
rulesCorrect: Green: the letter is correct and is in the correct position
errorBattle: There was an Error loading the Battle data
shareTweet: Check out my battle on WarWordly
